mapper.sql: id, programmeID, amount, totalAmount, openAmount, profit, parent, planno, expect, opencode, state
mapper.select:
select
from t_plan where programmeID = #{programmeID,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by id asc

select
from t_plan where programmeID = #{programmeID,jdbcType=INTEGER} and state = 0 order by id asc limit 0, 1
